author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Social Welfare Department officials stopped a marriage of two minor children.

Official sources said that the plan of the families, hailing from Valayapalayam near Palladam, came to light when a person in the village gave a tip-off to the officials.

The officials warned both the families not to marry off their children till they crossed the stipulated ages prescribed under the law.
title: Child marriage stopped
